embeds.title: Magic Mallet
embeds.description:
Uncommon Relic / The Gremlins / Downfall

Whenever you apply **Weak** :p_weak:, gain 1 Wiz, up to 3 times per turn.
*-# Stubs toes twice as hard.*

messages.content: it's fat/wiz hybrid relic
generally pretty good as you want to shift into attack spam later in the run
typically
this is because the most likely str engine you have is <makeshift armor> + flex

embeds.title: Makeshift Armor
embeds.description:
Uncommon Power / 1 :energy_gremlins: / The Gremlins / Downfall

 (Gain 1 **Artifact** :p_artifact:.)
Every time you play 7 attacks, gain 1 **Artifact** :p_artifact:.

messages.content: and fat is a natural grem to sit on in that scenario, especially for <heckle>

embeds.title: Heckle
embeds.description:
Uncommon Power / 3 (2) :energy_gremlins: / The Gremlins / Downfall

Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, gain 2 **Temp HP.**

messages.content: and you will usually be taking multihits for the purpose of winning earlygame as a properly setup wiz is the strongest grem at earlygame burst (ie dagger dance+, flurry)

Really cool relic that lets you get some additional burst damage and cross synergies when mostly using fat gremlin in the lead. Gremlins already really like spamming lots of attacks, so being able to use this as a sort of pen nib for every 4th attack works pretty naturally. Gives you some extra oomph as fat gremlin, and pairs especially well with multihits and AOE attacks. This will usually be fairly expensive at shops, and I probably wouldn't buy it unless I was confident I was already in a fat-centric deck, or had room to pivot into one later in the run. Makes a little more sense to buy if you already have the AOE attacks and multihits that pay off wiz. As a random drop, sometimes it will be pretty difficult to use if you are already too invested in using another primary gremlin, especially wizard or sneaky. Sometimes it will work out nicely if you aren't committed yet or are already leaning towards fat. Gremlins will usually easily be able to play 4+ attacks a turn to get full value from this, but you might want to put an extra priority on shiv generation, especially salt wounds. At it's best early in the run, when the burst damage from wiz is more valuable, though it does still help out to give some extra damage scaling into the new neow as well. Synergizes well with ninja relics/pen nib/ink bottle since they also want you to play lots of cheap attacks.
<gremlin attack weak uncommon>

embeds.title: Burly Blow
embeds.description:
Uncommon Attack / 2 :energy_gremlins: / The Gremlins / Downfall

Deal 4 (5) damage.  Repeat for each stack of **Weak** :p_weak:.

messages.content: This is probably the most powerful synergy for the relic
Every turn that it's possible first you spam shivs then you pop burly blow
Then you can stack <weakened gremlin power rate> on top of it

embeds.title: Target Wounds
embeds.description:
Rare Power / 1 :energy_gremlins: / The Gremlins / Downfall

Deal 3 (5) additional damage to **Weak** :p_weak:ened enemies.

messages.content: Things like that is why imo fatty is the strongest out of all the gremlins, especially in terms of damage
Also, if anything the relic gives you even more reason not to switch off the fat gremlin considering it basically gives him wizard gremlin passive effect
You can ignore wizard gremlin completely and still be able to pull of a wiz deck or at least some wiz synergies
fat mostly just scales well
weak only gets better over time
don’t really need burly blow if you have str gain tho
yeah
the only fat gremlin thing that scales badly is <cripple the enemy>

embeds.title: Gremlin Nob
embeds.description:
Elite / 82-86 (85-90) HP / Slay the Spire

**:intent_f: Bellow**
```ansi
[0;2mGains [2;31m2 [2;34m(3) [0;2mEnrage.
```**:intent_ad: Skull Bash**
```ansi
[2;31m6 [2;34m(8). [0;2mApplies [2;31m2 [2;33mVulnerable.
```**:intent_a: Rush**
```ansi
[2;31m14 [2;34m(16).
```
Enrage - Gains **Strength** :p_strength: whenever you play a skill.
Starts with Bellow. Then, has a 33%/67% chance to use Skull Bash/Rush, or, if on A18, repeats Skull Bash/Rush/Rush.
Cannot use Rush 3 times in a row.
